name: issuedepyt
title: Issue Dependencies
description: Visualize issue dependencies in a graph or tree. Issues with time information can also be visualized on a timeline.
changeNotes:
Version 1.7.0:
- Change graph engine to cytoscape.js.
- Fix open ticket on graph node double-click.
- Rework graph UI controls.
- Add support for other directions than top-down for hierarchical tree layouts.
- Add support for minimizing node labels.
